reviews.comment: Best sleep I've had in years! Perfect balance of soft and firm, and I don't feel my partner moving at all.
The cooling technology actually works - no more night sweats.
Great mattress overall, though took about 2 weeks to fully break in.
Finally found relief from my back pain after trying three other mattresses.
Too firm for my liking, even after the break-in period.
Really happy with the quality and comfort. Only giving 4 stars because the price is a bit steep.
Exceeded expectations in every way. My wife and I are both side and back sleepers.
Decent mattress but the cooling effect isn't as dramatic as advertised.
The motion isolation is incredible - I can't feel my husband getting up at all.
Great quality and comfort, shipping was quick. Only complaint is that it's quite heavy to move.
Perfect for our guest room! Everyone who stays over asks about where we got it.
Good value for money, but does retain some heat.
Great pressure relief and very comfortable. Just wish it had better edge support.
Too soft for my taste, and started to sag after 6 months.
Amazing price point for the quality. Perfect for side sleeping and the motion isolation is excellent.
Comfortable and good quality for the price. No off-gassing smell unlike other foam mattresses I've tried.
Best mattress I've owned in this price range. The memory foam really cradles my pressure points.
Developed a permanent body impression within 3 months.
Nice and comfortable, especially for the price point. Delivery and setup were hassle-free.
Decent mattress but runs a bit warm. Good for winter, not so much for summer months.
The combination of latex and memory foam is perfect. Haven't slept this well in decades!
Expensive but worth every penny. The zoned support really helps with my lower back pain.
Very comfortable but not sure it's worth the premium price. The organic materials are nice though.
Finally a luxury mattress that lives up to the hype. The natural materials help me sleep better knowing I'm not breathing in chemicals.
Too soft despite being advertised as medium-firm. The return process was easy though.
Best investment in my sleep ever. The latex layer adds the perfect amount of bounce while the memory foam contours perfectly.
Amazing quality and comfort, but be prepared for the weight - this is a heavy mattress.
Love the eco-friendly materials and the comfort is unmatched. Worth the splurge!
Great mattress but had to return due to latex allergy. Customer service was excellent throughout.
The split king option is perfect for my adjustable base. My only complaint is the price.
Perfect for my college apartment. Great value for the price point!
Decent quality for a guest room mattress. Nothing fancy but gets the job done.
Surprisingly comfortable for the price. My kids love it!
A bit too firm and basic. Wish I had spent a bit more for better quality.
Great starter mattress. Easy to move and setup, perfect for temporary living.
Does the job for occasional guest use. Wouldn't recommend for everyday use though.
Better than expected for the price point. Perfect for my teenager's room.
Started sagging after 6 months of use. You get what you pay for.
Good value mattress for a rental property. Easy to maintain and guests find it comfortable.
Decent temporary solution while saving for a better mattress. Shipping was quick and easy.
Amazing recovery after intense workouts. The copper-infused foam really seems to help with muscle soreness.
Great support and cooling features. Perfect for active people who sleep hot.
Best mattress I've found for athletic recovery. Worth the investment for serious athletes.
Expected more at this price point. The cooling features are good but found it too firm.
Finally found the perfect mattress for my training recovery. The pressure point relief is exceptional.
Really helps with post-workout recovery, though the price is a bit steep. The edge support is excellent.
Good mattress but the copper-infusion benefits are hard to verify. Still sleeping better than before.
As a marathon runner, this mattress has been a game-changer for my recovery. Love the cooling properties!
Very supportive and definitely helps with recovery. Removed one star because it's quite heavy to move.
Perfect balance of support and comfort for athletic recovery. The antimicrobial properties are a great bonus.
